alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lauderdale; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 1:33PM CST until December 14 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Southeastern Newton County in east central Mississippi... Southwestern Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 230 PM CST. * At 133 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Stringer, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Turnerville around 145 PM CST. Paulding around 155 PM CST. Rose Hill and Garlandville around 205 PM CST. Meehan around 225 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Chunky and Hickory. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
